Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays  following an earlier mechanical problem at Austin. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays  following an earlier mechanical problem at Austin.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
